livestock.description: Well cared-for adult chickens lay eggs every day. Lives in the coop.
livestock.name: Chicken

livestock.description: Adults can be milked daily. A milk pail is required to harvest the milk. Lives in the barn.
livestock.name: Cow

livestock.description: Happy adults provide goat milk every other day. A milk pail is required to harvest the milk. Lives in the barn.
livestock.name: Goat

livestock.description: Happy adults lay duck eggs every other day. Lives in the coop.
livestock.name: Duck

livestock.description: Adults can be shorn for wool. Sheep who form a close bond with their owners can grow wool faster. A pair of shears is required to harvest the wool. Lives in the barn.
livestock.name: Sheep

livestock.description: These are wooly rabbits! They shed precious wool every few days. Lives in the coop.
livestock.name: Rabbit

livestock.description: These pigs are trained to find truffles! Lives in the barn.
livestock.name: Pig

inventory.description: Dried grass used as animal food.
inventory.name: Hay

inventory.description: Keeps your animals warmer and happier during the winter.
inventory.name: Heater

inventory.description: Use this to collect wool from sheep
inventory.name: Shears

inventory.description: Automatically harvests from your animals each morning. Works on cows, sheep, and goats. Becomes available at Farming Level 10
inventory.name: Auto-Grabber

inventory.description: A decorative piece for your farm.
inventory.name: Ornamental Hay Bale
